name: Animal Platform Heroes - a Jumpgame
description:
Animal Platform Heroes - a Jumpgame

Jump from platform to platform and crack the highscore. Jump further and further with your cute little animals - the further the more points. Beat the highscore and compare yourself to your friends.

You can always unlock more new animals to jump around the world with. Unlock achievements and compare yourself to your friends.

Easy to learn, hard to master. Perfect for in between.

Completely free and without advertising - IndieGameDev with love! :-)

Start the adventure now and crack the highscore.
